comment: She is very nice. She tells you what she needs from you and her grading isn't too tough. There is a final group project but it isn't too difficult.

She is awesome. She cares students so much and kind. There are few essays to work on, but it's easy to meet her outside class and there are ESL center and writing center for more option to get good grades. I love her.
I took this English class online, and I really enjoyed it with this professor. She was super sweet and caring, and gave great feedback on my papers. Would definitely take again!

Mrs. Brown is an extremely sweet lady who wants you to do well in her class. I took her again for English 1102 because she is extremely helpful in her office hours. If you participate, she likes you. Must attend class but that is campus policy, not hers.
I loved Professor Brown. She is such a sweet lady who really wants her students to succeed. 3 essays that are 3-4 pages and one project that is super easy. Take this class for an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is AMAZING! If you come to class you will pass. As long as you try and have open communication with her, you will get an "A".  There are only 2 big papers (3-5 pages) in the semester. Not much work outside the class besides the two easy papers. Offers extra credit multiple times. Average B student in ENGLISH in high school.

Don't take her in the morning. Miss 4 classes and your grade is dropped by 10 points. Miss 6, and you fail, no questions asked. Also she's pretty crazy about deadlines and putting your assignments in the right place at the right time. If you aren't a completely organized person I would not request her to you.

She is literally the definition of a mom, she makes mom jokes no lie and its so quirky and she tries to make the boring class less boring. Your main grades are 4 papers you rite throughout the semester but thats it, and she is not a tough grader, she doesn't expect extra work just follow her guidelines and she gives great instruction.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is seriously the cutest quirky lady ever. I'm going to miss her as a professor. She is more than willing to help you with any assignment if you need it. She has you write 4 papers and 3 of them are out of 100 pts and 1 of them is out of 200 pts so its the biggest chunk of your grade. Her class is really easy if you can manage deadlines.

I love her! She's so sweet and respectful, unlike any professor I've had. She is really great and knows how to teach you to understand the material. !! Approachable for help!! There are about 5 papers, homework is rare (always online, easy), no phone policy!

Class is so boring and pointless to attend but she makes you. Doesn't help you improve your paper and is too tough of a grader. If you're not a kiss up then don't expect a good grade. Wish I would've had a different teacher.

I hated her class at first. Her lectures are very boring and it was hard for me to start papers but she helped me SOOO much in her office hours and I have gotten an A on every single paper and homework assignment. She is very vert nice and is willing to help you.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Prof Brown is a pretty decent teacher. She is extremely helpful with papers and doesn't grade too harshly. She gave a few extra credit points and the class isn't boring. She's nice but lets her emotions get in the way if she's having a bad day. Once got mad at the class talking and went off and said she was "too upset to teach" and let us out early
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor has good sense of humor and very caring/understanding

Overall an okay professor. Attendance is mandatory, she takes off points for missing class. 3 papers, 4 in-class reading responses, and a few other grades here and there. She is not always clear on what she wants and is an extremely tough grader, but she gave tons of extra credit at the end and gave everyone As on the last paper to boost grades.

She is a nice professor. She does care for students especially for international students by speaking slowly, and clarifying the day's lecture over and over again. However, you need to try to participate in class actively to get her help that you want.
Overall a pretty decent English professor. Relatively nice and will help you if you ask her for assistance. However, she is a stickler for attendance.

She treated me different because I am a girl in a sorority. Constantly called me out and told me I was not disciplined. Don't take her if you're a girl. She was fine to the boys and the foreign exchange students.
